content: Post-merge review of @Frédéric Dupuis 's #13424: I'm surprised that docs#SeminormedAddCommGroup.Core is called like this, not SeminormedSpace.Core. IMHO, SeminormedAddCommGroup.Core should not have a NormedField argument.
I could change it. I agree it's strange that it has a NormedField argument, but on the other hand SeminormedSpace doesn't actually exist.
I think that we may need an .ofCore constructor for normed groups without a normed space structure.
If you want to write it Yury, I'll review it quickly.
I'll add it to my TODO list, scheduled to the next weekend (unless someone does it earlier).
